items.title: Pregnancy Complications Tied to Increased Stroke Risk
items.description: A history of pregnancy complications, including hypertensive disorders, is linked to an increased risk for ischemic stroke, a new study shows. Medscap...

items.title: Diabetes Technology: Lifesaving and Stressful
items.description: Clinicians should ask patients if they’re experiencing ‘diabetes device distress’ and help guide them through it. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Seafood Anaphylaxis Patterns Vary by Age, Sex, and Region
items.description: Researchers analyzed cases of fish- and shellfish-induced anaphylaxis in 11 European countries and Brazil. Medscape Medical News
